mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no, p.board_id, p.title, p.view_count, p.regdate, b.board_type FROM post p JOIN board b ON p.board_id = b.board_id where p.board_id=#{boardId}
SELECT * FROM post WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND POST_No = #{postNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND POST_No = #{postNo}
INSERT INTO POST (post_no, title, content, user_no, board_id) values(post_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{userNo}, #{boardId})
